title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7304.3 - Application for certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7304.3 - Application for certification

State Regulations

Any application for an operating certificate pursuant to
this Part shall be made upon forms prescribed by the Commission, which shall
contain: (a) the name of the facility
and its location; (b) the name and
address of the authorized agency, corporation, association, organization, proprietary operator or public agency, who or which operates such
facility; (c) any plan to collocate
a facility with a juvenile secure detention facility; (d) the counties to be serviced by the
facility; (e) a physical
description of the facility, including land, buildings and equipment; (f) proposed resident capacity; (g) a plan and description of staff
positions, including duties and qualifications; (h) if applicant is a corporation, the names, addresses and occupations of the members of the board of directors; (i) the ownership or control of the land and
premises, if other than the operator; and
(j) such other information as may be
required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7304.3

Adopted

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
